summary: Skyra landing-page web app scaffold with Motoko backend and React+Vite frontend; landing page content updated with product offerings section, refreshed build-template/tooling, and integrated Skyra logo/favicon assets with improved logo rendering.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold with authorization and access control
existing_features.description: Introduces backend canister entrypoint plus reusable authorization mixin and access-control module to gate backend functionality.

existing_features.title: React + Vite frontend scaffold (build-template aligned)
existing_features.description: Sets up a React/Vite frontend with shared build-template configuration (workspace/package tooling, lint rules, env/config, and TS config) and backend type bindings.

existing_features.title: Skyra landing page UI with structured sections
existing_features.description: Implements a Skyra marketing/landing page composed of multiple sections (hero, problem, what/why Skyra, how it works, applications, case study, sustainability/ESG, future vision, footer, CTA) and top navigation.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity integration hooks
existing_features.description: Adds frontend hooks/utilities to support Internet Identity authentication and actor creation for backend calls.

existing_features.title: Contact form component and submission hook
existing_features.description: Adds a contact form UI component and a hook for submitting form data, with supporting storage/url parameter utilities.

existing_features.title: shadcn-ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: Adds a broad set of shadcn-ui components and related frontend configuration (components.json, Tailwind/PostCSS setup, ESLint rules).

existing_features.title: Asset pipeline and generated brand/hero images
existing_features.description: Adds build scripts to prune/resize images and includes generated Skyra visual assets used by the landing page.

existing_features.title: Products/offerings section added to Skyra landing page
existing_features.description: Adds a dedicated ProductsSection component and wires it into the Skyra landing page content flow to present additional product offerings.

existing_features.title: Site branding assets integrated (logo mark, logo, favicon)
existing_features.description: Adds generated logo assets (logo, logo mark, favicon) to frontend/public/assets/generated and integrates branding into the app where applicable.

existing_features.title: Logo rendering/background corrected for clean site display
existing_features.description: Updates the generated Skyra logo asset(s) and related frontend styling/markup so the site logo renders cleanly without an undesirable background artifact.

existing_features.title: Update the top navigation branding so the upper-left brand area displays the text “Skyra” and removes the logo image (no `/assets/generated/skyra-logo.dim_512x512.png` in the navbar). Keep the existing click-to-scroll-to-top behavior on the brand area.
Replace the hero background image overlay with a new outdoor metro station photo featuring visible tiles (instead of the current tiles pattern image).

Update the Applications section card images so: (1) “Metro & Railway Stations” uses an outdoor metro station photo featuring tiles, and (2) “Public Buildings”, “Walls & Facades”, and “Urban Furniture” each use their own distinct photos (not the shared tiles pattern).
Add the new generated images to `frontend/public/assets/generated` and reference them directly from the React components (no backend routing for images).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace header branding: remove logo image and display 'Skyra' text on the upper-left (navbar/hero)
Update Applications imagery: use an outdoor metro station photo featuring tiles, and add/replace images for Public Buildings, Walls & Facades, and Urban Furniture cards/sections

architectural_notes: Backend is a Motoko canister with shared authorization mixin and access-control module for gating operations.
Frontend is a React + Vite TypeScript app aligned with the build-template workspace/tooling.
UI layer uses shadcn-ui components with TailwindCSS/PostCSS and custom ESLint rules (e.g., Internet Identity provider enforcement).
Frontend integrates Internet Identity via dedicated hooks and uses generated backend declaration bindings for actor calls.
Project includes image maintenance scripts (prune/resize) and ships pre-generated marketing assets in frontend/public/assets/generated.
Branding assets (logo mark/logo/favicon) are now included under frontend/public/assets/generated and used by the frontend for site identity.
Build-template workspace/tooling files were refreshed across backend/frontend scaffolding (Dockerfile, scripts, configs, shadcn-ui component set).
